reviews.text: Gerardo was fantastic. Introduced us to new menu items and was friendly throughout. We got to meet Mia as well, and share how obvious it is there has been a change in management. Great improvements!

Very beutiful place, The food was delicious, The weiter Jerry was amazing,kind and happy! Rigth bill
Jerry Topp!!! Super kind and carfully !! Sono italiana e esperienza da provare ! Cibo buonissimo!!!
The variety of menu choices allowed everyone in our party of 7 to choose exactly what they wanted.The food was very good and our server Jerry was superb!
The wait staff isn't friendly.  The food use to be much better. I had a Patty Melt,  it was soaked butter. The French fries were like saw dust.
Sehr lecker!

Probably the best burger i've ever had !  Excellent quality beef.  Good choice of beers on tap, very lively atmosphere. A very satisfied customer !

AND STIIL,
THE BEST BURGER IN THE WORLD!
Thank you Gio for looking after this evening. The food and service were amazing. Thank You

Great.

This is by far the best burger I had in NYC.
Awsome service
Perfekt sted Ã¥ spise en ekte amerikansk burger.
Hamburger buonissimi e personale molto accogliente, ci ha servito Hugo che Ã¨ stato davvero molto gentile e disponibile.
great burgers but I just want to compliment our server who was top class, really nice person, dont recall his name. We didnt have a reservation, ate at an outside table. Worked out very well.

I ordered the traditional â€˜5 napkin burgerâ€™ but didnâ€™t get the 4 additional napkins with the burger. ğŸ™ƒâ€¦
Gio was great!
Very testy thanks for gio
Gio the best â¤ï¸

We had a cousin's party get together after many years of not having everyone at one setting.  Roldan our waiter was superb, handling our group of 9 flawlessly.  Cheers to Roldan and the great food here!
Nice place.  Good burgers, shakes, vibe.  Only gave us one napkin though, so false advertising!
Ottimo tutto dal accoglienza al servizio ma soprattutto per il cibo tutto di ottima qualitÃ ... invito a tutti di andare.

Unâ€™esperienza culinaria da veri newyorkesi.
Staff gentile e disponibile.
Consiglio la carrot cake come dolce.
Incredibile service by our waiter Roldan!!!
Fantastic experience, great food, excellent service. I recommend everyone to come here.
Excellent food and Jerry was the nicest waiter ever. Will come back.

Had a late lunch yesterday with my mom and we were both very impressed. Our sever Jerry was attentive and friendly; he and the food runner were both fantastic. So was the food! The burgers were cooked perfectly, and the cheesecake was top-notch- even the coffee was really good. Perfect spot for a burger and dessert.

Our server was very nice, but very mediocre food. We returned a frozen margarita because they never said it had a fruit flavor, the mac and cheese was bland and zero taste, old pasta. Burgers were overcooked when we ordered them medium. Salads were dry. Very negative experience.

Cute, classic burger/dinner with amazing service and one of the most flavorful and juices burgers I ever had! Their onion ring stack was super light, thin, and crispy.  Their sweet potato fries were very flavorful, fresh, and non greasy. The food comes out fast and their spiked milk shakes were a nice surprise ğŸ˜Š......to think i was mainly going there originally for the tall chocolate cake. Definitely stop here when ever ur in the mood for a great burger n the chocolate cake is amazing at room temp (they serve it clod to keep it fresh).
Accidentally found this place while visiting a bakery nearby. Great atmosphere and the service from Jerry was wonderful. Food and drinks were amazing. Thank you!

Jerry made this evening very special for us because of his funny kind of humor. He was respectful and kind. Personally I remember his humerous reaction when I asked for an extra lettuce leaf. The food was big but good (We are from Switzerland so size is not perfectly ğŸ¤£). The shakes were also pretty good and I enjoyed drinking it.
Very taste hamburger ğŸ”
Awesome first time experience! Our server, Jerry, provided great l, experienced service! Highly recommend!
I love this place. Great happy hour sliders. Shout out to Ivan! Just wish HH went to 7PM.
I had the original 5 napkin burger and it was amazing!
Jerry and the food was great.

Jerry our waiter was great!!!!!
The place we were sitting in was near the door and it was cold
I love five napkin and my server Jerry was so nice and helpful. I'd come back just for him!!! :)

I did have a chicken breast burger and my friend a turkey burger. Both were ok but not super exciting.
It more fast food with sit in option .
Restaurante acogedor, con buen ambiente y precios razonables. El servicio fue excelente, y el camarero que nos atendiÃ³ (Â¡en espaÃ±ol!) fue encantador. Muy recomendable.

Jerry was a nice waiter ğŸ‘
Nice food and it was quick.
Amazing food and service! The truffle burger was probably the best burger I have ever had!
Jerry was amazing!!! I would for sure come here again!

I went in before a Broadway show to watch my team play a baseball game. I am incredibly superstitious and Ivan the bartender was so kind and understanding about all my quirks. Kept my soda filled to the right level, left my plate and napkin in the right spot, ect, all with a smile! Then when the game ended, he made sure I got fed and to my show on time! The food was great, and the happy hour prices are the best in the area. I will absolutely be going back!
The best bartender and drinks in Hellâ€™s Kitchen! Thanks Ivan!
Great place to sta, drink and have a dinner. We were satisfied.

Sono stata qui ieri, con mio marito. Esperienza fantastica, cibo delizioso, personale super educato e subito disponibile, ambiente molto carino.
Essendo una persona con molte allergie quando vado in un posto nuovo (sopratutto che non parla la mia lingua) ho sempre un poâ€™ paura di magiareâ€¦ma qui non Ã¨ stato cosÃ¬. Ho chiesto alla ragazza cosa potessi mangiare per via delle mie allergie. Mi ha indicato tutto quello che potevo ordinare (fortunatamente tutto) ed abbiamo mangiato davvero dei panini ottimi. Siamo italianiâ€¦abbiamo provato i Mac and cheese, anche quelli hanno un loro fascino.
SUPER CONSIGLIATO.

Very good food.  The staff were friendly and offered suggestions.  If you can get an inside table next to the window s, you can enjoy viewing people rushing by.  The Happy Hour Menu is very good.  Prices are typical for this area.  I look forward to eating here again on my next visit to NYC.

5 Napkin Burger is just the best for that old-school, chill vibe. Seriously, the place is decorated so perfectly, it really sets the mood. No reservations, just walk in how great is that! And the food was undeniably delicious. Especially my kale salad! You can tell they use fresh ingredients because the flavors and spices are just spot-on, perfectly combined. Our drinks were super refreshing too, which is always a plus. And honestly, the service was top-notch! It's exactly what you want when you're hungry and looking for something cozy, comforting, and just genuinely good.

Uno dei pochi posti dove il servizio Ã¨ realmente veloce, gli hamburger non trasudano solo grasso.

In generale la qualitÃ  dei prodotti Ã¨ alta, nessun sapore troppo predominante, il pane Ã¨ trattato con cura e non sembra aver affrontato una guerra (altra cosa non scontata).

Purtroppo la cittÃ  Ã¨ altamente frequentata da gente proveniente da tutto il mondo (con standard completamente diversi l'uno dall'altro) quindi anche locali che hanno recensioni stupende non risultano all'altezza: 5 napkin burger Ã¨ uno dei pochi locali nei quali le recensioni rispecchiano realmente l'andamento generale del servizio e dei prodotti offerti.

A no-frills old school burger place truly delivers. The patty is big and juicy., my only wish is that they came with a side of fries.

We tried both the truffle mushroom and the classic burger. The truffle mushroom burger was the winner for me.

Unlike other places that serve sad small wings, this place serves up some of the largest and meatiest wings youâ€™ll find

Plenty of outdoor seating, super dog friendly, charcoal approved â˜‘ï¸

Second time eating here and enjoyed it as much as the first time. Great burgers and drinks. We reserved a table ahead of time and just walked in. If I had any complaints, the fries are lacking character but not bad. Bonus points that they are crinkle cut.

5 Napkin Burger in Hellâ€™s Kitchen is a chill spot to grab some tasty grub. We popped in for a laid-back date night with our pup and decided to sit outside in the summer heat, which was just perfect.

First off, the tuna poke appetizer was off the chartsâ€”definitely order that! My partner couldnâ€™t get enough of the wings, and the onion rings hit the spot, crispy and delicious.

Drink-wise, the frozen watermelon margarita stole the show. My partner loved it; itâ€™s super refreshing and perfect for a warm evening.

I tried the truffle burger, and while it was good, it was a bit too rich for my taste. No biggie, though. My partner's buffalo chicken sandwich was awesomeâ€”packed with flavor and just right.

We did make a reservation, but there were a few empty tables, so itâ€™s pretty chill if you decide to just wander in. Overall, 5 Napkin's a great spot to hang out, enjoy some good food, and soak in the Hell's Kitchen vibe. Plus, dog-friendly seating is a win!

I have a 5 napkin burger and 5 napkin gold large.
Itâ€™s absolutely amazing burger, the patty is so crunchy outside and tender inside. Once I bite it, the juicy of meat burst into my mouth, comes with onion which is totally caramelized well.
Amazing place for burger!
Itâ€™s my personal favorite burger place!
I will definitely visit again once I come back to New York.

Jerry is a great waiter, itâ€™s great to have him in this pleasure meal. Itâ€™s the first time in New York Iâ€™m willing to tip.

Stopped in with a friend and everything was delicious! I had the Italian turkey burger with a frozen watermelon margarita, and Katie had the sliders with cheese & bacon fries (which I definitely shared). The drinks were refreshing, the food was flavorful, and while service was a little slow at first, it was worth the wait. Great spot near Times Square!

Very tasty food and great service! Burgers are delicious but HUGE; light eaters may want to split one with someone. Decent fries (which you can have loaded if desired), great onion rings, and surprisingly good Brussels sprouts can accompany your entree (we didn't try the broccoli side, but that is also an option). The only drawback about dining in is that it's very loud, making conversation difficult.

When in New York, Five Napkin Burger is the place to go for a burger experience that hits all the right notes. Juicy, tasty, and downright delicious, their burgers are everything you crave and more. The star of the menu? The Truffle Burgerâ€”a heavenly creation thatâ€™s rich, flavorful, and unforgettable with every bite. The ambiance strikes the perfect balance between casual and trendy, making it great for a quick lunch or a laid-back dinner. Whether youâ€™re a local or just passing through, Five Napkin is a must for burger lovers.

Ci siamo andati , con aspettative altissime, dopo aver visto i video su you tube â€œ cosa mangiamo oggi â€œ di Giano  e Francesca . Ottimi hamburger , servizio velocissimo , prezzo qualitÃ  eccezionale. Anche le patatine , buonissime ,croccanti fuori e tenere dentro. Abbiamo ordinato  un
5 napkins hamburger chiedendolo senza formaggio . Carne succosa , cotta a puntino (super buono) ed un avocado burger (purtroppo per colpa nostra ) sbagliando in questo caso lâ€™ordinazione , perchÃ© nel menu era chiaramente indicato negli ingredienti pepper jack , che avevamo inteso come un  tipo dÃ¬ peperoni o salame mentre in realtÃ  Ã¨ un formaggio al pepe. Facendo notare che non volevamo il formaggio nel panino per intolleranza al lattosio, il cameriere Ã¨ stato gentilissimo e ha chiesto alla cucina di riprepararlo senza nessun addebito in conto. In Italia chissÃ  se sarebbe andata cosÃ¬. Da ritornare assolutamente

Ãˆ uno dei panini piÃº buoni di tutta new york. Siamo andati ad ora di pranzo, non câ€™era molta affluenza e ci siamo subito accomodati. Il personale ci ha subito servito un po di beverage e pochi minuti dopo hanno preso la comanda. I panini sono tutti buonissimi ma qualsiasi panino prendiate, richiedete le loro patatine fritte e i cetriolini vicino al panino, sono qualcosa di spaziale.
Il conto Ã¨ stato onesto, circa 70$ + tip per 2 persone.

The food and drinks were amazing!
Vibe was super chill.
I had the Avocado Ranch burger at the hostessâ€™ recommendation and it was a slam dunk.
Best French fries tooâ€¦perfectly cooked.
Get the cranberry iced teaâ€¦best iced tea Iâ€™ve ever had.
The service was great and our server Brandon was knowledgeable on the menu.
Aaron was managing/bartending and I blame him for me having to drink the best iced tea ever.
Will 100% be back again.

Bel posto in cui mangiare tipico comfort food americano di qualitÃ ! Ottimi gli anelli di cipolla fritti e le patate, panini super! Personale garbato e cordiale. Se hai voglia di un buon pasto a Hellâ€™s Kitchen Ã¨ la scelta ideale!
My go to burger spot in the city! The original 5 napkin burger and onion rings tower are the way to go. They also have great seasonal menu and their watermelon margaritas are awesome!

Stopped in at late night happy hour, prices are very fair if you stop in after 9pm. Food came out fast and hot. Service was good but staff was a little over eager to clear, Iâ€™d like to eat my pickle before you clear the plates. Itâ€™s worth it for a juicy burger. I didnâ€™t love the restaurant layout, everyoneâ€™s on top of each other and on display. Other than that great place for a burger and a beer
